Title: Love Sonia
Writer: Ted Caplan, Tabrez Noorani (story), Ritesh Shah (hindi dialogue), Alkesh Vaja
Actors: Demi Moore, Mark Duplass, Freida Pinto, Rajkummar Rao
Plot: Inspired by real life events, Love Sonia is the story of a young girl's journey to rescue her sister from the dangerous world of international sex trafficking.
